answers.answer: Hi, my first test came back positive but on the second test which is a long three hours it came back negative which happens frequently I was told.  Don't freak out ... worst case scenario you just have to monitor what you eat.  Best of luck.

Same thing happened to me and I just found out what triggers my blood sugar spikes (which was milk products) and stopped eating or drinking it. Quick fix. I think that test needs revision.  There are too many pregnancies that come back positive when it truly isn't the case.
I am having my third child and with all three my first test came out positive. But the three hour test came out negative.

I currently am going thru gestational diabetes with this pregnancy... I have to check my blood sugar 4 times daily and monitor what I eat...  I also go to a fetal specialist that keeps an eye on how the baby is developing

question: I just had my 28 weeks blood work done and I came back positive for Gestational diabetes.  I'm kind in freaking out , it's my first pregnancy.  So has anyone else had this & everything else with the pregnancy go find .
title: Freaking out !
